maqras.text: Arabs dictus Nos est Mu'mens (believers.) Dictus Vos non believed quod vos dictus est ‘Nos est Muslims (submitters) ' belief established tuus hearts vos obey DEUS His messenger He non put any de tuus works waste DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Mu'mens (believers) est those believe in DEUS His messenger tunc attain status habet non doubt whatsoever strive their moneta their vita in causa DEUS! These est truthful unus
Dictus vos informing DEUS tuus religionis? DEUS knows everything in CAELUM TERRA. DEUS est Omniscient

They act prout they perfecit vos favor embracing Submission! Dictus Vos non perfecit me any favors embracing Submission! DEUS est UNUS EST PERFECIT VOS MAJOR favor guiding VOS to faith VOS est sincere
DEUS knows TOTUS secrets in CAELUM TERRA; DEUS est Seer DE everything VOS PERFECIT
ac glorious Quran
They invenit it peregrinus ut warner ex them advenit them! disbelievers dictus Hoc est really peregrinus
Post nos abiit become dust hoc est impossible
Nos est fully aware de anyone de them gets consumed terra; nos habet accurate actum
They rejected truth when it advenit them; they utterly confused
they non looked caelum supra them quam nos constructed it adorned it flaw
Nos created terra scattered it montis grew it totus generis de beautiful plants
Hoc est enlightenment reminder omnis pius worshiper
Nos sent caelum beatus aqua grow it gardens grains harvested
Tall datum palms clustered fruit
Provisions people Nos revive it denatus terra; vos similarly resurrected
Disbelieving them est people Noah dwellers Russ Thamoud
‘Aad Pharaoh brethren Lot
dwellers silva people Tubba. Totus de them disbelieved messengers consequently My retribution befell them
Nos too burdened 1 creation? Hoc why they est doubt resurrection
Nos created human nos know quod he whispers ipse. Nos est closer to eum than his jugular vein
actum (angels) apud rectus apud sinister constantly actum
Non utterance perfecit he utter alert testis
Tandem inevitable coma decessus advenit; hoc est quod vos tried evade
horn blown hoc est promised feria
Omnis anima advenit cum herder testis
Vos used est oblivious to hoc. Nos statim remove tuus veil hodie tuus vision est (prout strong prout steel)
companion dictus Hic est my formidable testimony
Throw into Gehenna omnis stubborn disbeliever
Forbidder charity aggressor foderator de doubt
He set DEUS alias deus. Throw eum into severe retribution
